title: The Staff of Withering
data:

| ------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Base item                             | [quarterstaff](/wiki/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff")                                                                                                        |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                          |
| Damage vs. small                      | 1d6 **+5 + level drain**                                                                                                                                 |
| Damage vs. large                      | 1d6 **+5 + level drain**                                                                                                                                 |
| To-hit bonus                          | **+3**                                                                                                                                                   |
| Bonus versus                          | not [drain resistant](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance")                                                                                         |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                          |

|                                       |                                                                                                                                                          |

| When wielded                          | *(none)*                                                                                                                                                 |
| When [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") | - [energy](/wiki/Energy "Energy") boost                                                                                                                  |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                          |

| Weight                                | [40](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                              |
| Material                              | [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood")                                                                                                                                |

**The Staff of Withering** is the [Lycanthrope](/wiki/Lycanthrope "Lycanthrope") [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") in [NetHack Plus](/wiki/NetHack_Plus "NetHack Plus") and [SLASH 6](/wiki/SLASH_6 "SLASH 6"). It is also the quest artifact for the [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") version of the [Lunatic](/wiki/Lunatic "Lunatic") role, which has a [quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest") adapted from the former [Lycanthrope quest](/wiki/Lycanthrope_quest "Lycanthrope quest").

Its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a [quarterstaff](/wiki/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff"). The Staff's attack can drain life from its targets ("The Staff of Withering draws the life from \<target>!").

When carried, the Staff grants [cold resistance](/wiki/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance"). When invoked, it provides a boost in [spell energy](/wiki/Energy "Energy"), similar to [the Mitre of Holiness](/wiki/The_Mitre_of_Holiness "The Mitre of Holiness").

## References

- SLASH 6 include/artilist.h#line 314
- SLASH 6 src/artifact.c#line 1062

The Staff of Withering is the Lycanthrope quest artifact in NetHack Plus and SLASH 6. It is also the quest artifact for the SlashTHEM version of the Lunatic role, which has a quest adapted from the former Lycanthrope quest.

Its base item is a quarterstaff. The Staff's attack can drain life from its targets ("The Staff of Withering draws the life from <target>!").

When carried, the Staff grants cold resistance. When invoked, it provides a boost in spell energy, similar to the Mitre of Holiness.

References

  • SLASH 6 include/artilist.h#line 314
  • SLASH 6 src/artifact.c#line 1062
